Johnson Family Health Center / Your Health Care Team  Your Health Care Team tlowery1 2019-08-28T11:17:33-05:00 The UI Health L.P. Johnson Family Health Center was created as a teaching facility for the University of Illinois College of Medicine Rockford. Here, resident physicians in the Family Medicine Residency Program are part of your health care team as they get experience under the guidance of attending physicians. Our attending physicians are faculty members of the University of Illinois College of Medicine Rockford and oversee the care of patients of all ages and phases of life. Nurses, medical assistants, a clinical pharmacist and behavioral health specialists are also part of your team, working together to provide the best possible care for you and your family. Attending Physicians Andrew Dudas, DO  Mary Jo Ironside, MD  Mitch King, MD  Karen Liao, MD  Kenton Lee, MD  Joe Ross, MD  Behavioral Health Specialists Sherry Falsetti, PhD  Alesia Jones, PhD Nurse Practitioners Kelly Rosenberger, DNP, CNM, WHNP-BC, APN Clinical Pharmacist Annette Hays, PharmD  Learn more about Pregnancy Services. Scheduling routine appointments ahead of time helps ensure you get the time that best fits your schedule with the doctor of your choice, but sometimes your need is more urgent. With our team approach to health care, you typically can see one of our resident physicians or nurse practitioners the same day you call. For appointments, call (815) 972-1000.
